entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 12:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
